attributes.action: Setup the Motorway information systems so it actually provides real information!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of the UK through taxes has paid millions for the 'driver information system' on our motorways and 'A' roads.
 All they ever do is advise to 'Take a break, don't drive tired' and other useless information.
 See other European services for a comparision, especially the Paris 'Périphérique' M25 equivalent

This is an appalling Waste of public money - providing no service!
